bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Software-Hardware Interface for Multi-Many-Core
IEEE Standard for Software-Hardware Interface for Multi-Many-Core

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is intended primarily for tool developers and hardware developers who would use Software Hardware Interface for Multi-Many-core (SHIM) to exchange hardware description for software tools. It also attempts to provide software developers with insights into what hardware information is described in SHIM to foster understanding of the intention and the extent of SHIM.

This standard is intended primarily for tool developers and hardware developers who would use Software Hardware Interface for Multi-Many-core (SHIM) to exchange hardware description for software tools. It also attempts to provide software developers with insights into what hardware information is described in SHIM to foster understanding of the intention and the extent of SHIM.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
